name: Acht Acht
description:
Take control of the infamous "eighty-eight" and thwart a Russian attack!

Features

  • Control the infamous 8,8 cm FlaK 37
  • Take on the role of spotter and gunner
  • Engage enemy tanks at distances up to 1000m
  • Realistic damage model, optics and reload time
  • Enemy tanks: T34-76, T34-85, KV-85
  • Friendly tanks: Panzer IV

Controls

Spotter

Look: Mouse

Zoom: Shift / Right mouse

Change to Gunner: Tab

Gunner

Aim: WASD

Zoom: Shift / Right mouse

Fire: Space / Left mouse

Change to Spotter: Tab
